title: Kusebko Larere Festival
text:
Kusebko Larere Festival is an annual festival celebrated by the chiefs and people of Sumbrungu in the <a href="Bolgatanga%20Municipal%20District">Bolgatanga District</a> in the <a href="Upper%20East%20Region">Upper East Region</a> of <a href="Ghana">Ghana</a>. It is usually celebrated in the month of January.
Celebrations.
During the festival, visitors are welcomed to share food and drinks. The people put on traditional clothes and there is durbar of chiefs. There is also dancing and drumming.
Significance.
This festival is celebrated to mark an event that took place in the past.
